translations.DNS_description: DNS is a fundamental internet service to translate domain names to IP addresses. Each DNS test checks if this service is available, if answers are correct and measures server response time.
translations.ECHO_PROTOCOL_description: The client connects to a server that supports the Echo Protocol. Then the server sends back an identical copy of the data it received.
translations.HTTP_PROXY_description: This test downloads a test web resource (e.g. image) and checks, if it was modified during transport.
translations.MKIT_DASH_description: The Dash test analyzes the video streaming performance of the network connection.
translations.NON_TRANSPARENT_PROXY_description: This test checks if a request is modified by a proxy or other middlebox.
translations.RESULT_DETAILS: Test Result (click on hyperlinked values for advanced search)
translations.RESULT_SHARE_INTRO: My measurement result from the BEREC nettest system:
translations.SIP_description: This test uses the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) to establish (set up) and simulate short calls to determine internet telephony key performance indicators.
translations.TCP_description: TCP is the most common connection-oriented internet protocol. Typical services http for websites or smtp for e-mail.
translations.TRACEROUTE_description: Traceroute shows the route across IP based networks.
translations.UDP_description: UDP is an important connectionless internet protocol. Typical services real-time communication like VoIP or video streaming.
translations.VOIP_description: Voice over IP (VoIP) is a technology for the delivery of voice communication over IP based networks.
translations.WEBSITE_description: The website rendering test downloads a reference web page (mobile Kepler page by ETSI), checks completeness, correct rendering and measures duration.
translations.audio_streaming.testinfo:
Number of stalls: %PARAM number_of_stalls 1 0 f%
Total stall time: %PARAM total_stall_time_ns 1000000 0 f% ms
Average stall time: %PARAM average_stall_time_ns 1000000 0 f% ms

Audio start time: %PARAM audio_start_time_ns 1000000 0 f% ms (the time it took from start playing command to the actual start of the audio stream)
translations.dash.old_testinfo: %EVAL result = (typeof mkit_result !== 'undefined') ? ('Dash test detailed result: ' + String(nn.prettifyJson(JSON.stringify(mkit_result)))) : 'No result available';%
translations.dash.testinfo: %EVAL if(typeof mkit_result !== 'udefined') { r = mkit_result; if (typeof mkit_result === 'string') { r = JSON.parse(mkit_result); } if (r.test_keys && r.test_keys.simple) { result = 'Video streaming possible with a bitrate of ' + r.test_keys.simple.median_bitrate + ' kbps. This equals a video resolution of ' + String(nn.getAchievableStreamingResolution(r.test_keys.simple.median_bitrate)) + '.' } else { result = 'Test successful';}}  else { result = 'No result available'; }%
translations.description_group_connectivity: Details about the connection to the measurement peer
translations.description_group_device: Details about the device used for the measurement
translations.description_group_network: Details about the used network during the measurement
translations.description_group_overview: General result of the performed measurement
translations.description_speed_parameter_group: Detailed results from the executed speed measurement
translations.dns.testinfo:
DNS request for the domain: %PARAM dns_objective_host%
Requested Record: %PARAM dns_objective_dns_record%

Test Result:
DNS Status: %PARAM dns_result_status%
DNS Entries: %PARAM dns_result_entries%
Test Duration: %PARAM duration_ns 1000000 0 f% ms
translations.dns.unknowndomain.failure: Requesting a non-existent domain has returned the invalid result: %PARAM dns_result_entries%
translations.dns.unknowndomain.info:
A non-existent domain (%PARAM dns_objective_host%) was requested to check the response of the domain's DNS %PARAM dns_objective_dns_record% record.
The correct answer should be 'NXDOMAIN' (non-existent domain).
DNS Status: '%PARAM dns_result_status%';
Duration: %PARAM duration_ns 1000000 0 f% ms
translations.dns.unknowndomain.success: DNS-request for a non-existent domain succeeded. No entries have been returned.
translations.http.failure: Received content differs from the original. Modification is likely.
translations.http.success: Received content equals the original. No modification detected.
translations.http.testinfo:
Target: '%PARAM http_objective_url%'
Range: %EVAL result =  (typeof http_objective_range !== 'undefined') ? http_objective_range : 'n/a';%
Duration: %PARAM duration_ns 1000000000 1 f% s
Length: %PARAM http_result_length%
Status Code: %PARAM http_result_status%
Hash: %PARAM http_result_hash%
Header: 
%PARAM http_result_header%
translations.key_NOT_AVAILABLE: Roaming information is not supported by the platform
translations.mkit.failure: Measurement not completed due to an error
translations.ndt.failure: Network diagnostics test was not successful
translations.ndt.testinfo: %EVAL result = (typeof mkit_result !== 'undefined') ? ('Network diagnostics test detailed result: ' + String(nn.prettifyJson(mkit_result))) : 'No result available';%
translations.ntp.failure: Request to QoS measurement peer was manipulated.
translations.ntp.success: Request to QoS measurement peer was not modified.
translations.ntp.testinfo:
Content '%PARAM nontransproxy_objective_request%' requested from measurement server.
The answer was: '%PARAM nontransproxy_result_response%'
translations.tcp.failure: Test failed. Connection could not be established.
translations.tcp.in.testinfo:
TCP Incoming:
An incoming connection on port %PARAM tcp_objective_in_port% was attempted. Result: %PARAM tcp_result_in%.
translations.tcp.out.testinfo:
TCP Outgoing:
An outgoing connection to QoS measurement peer on port %PARAM tcp_objective_out_port% was attempted.
translations.test.dash: The Dash test analyzes the video streaming performance of the network connection.
translations.test.desc.dns:
Target: %PARAM dns_objective_host% 
Entry: %PARAM dns_objective_dns_record%
Resolver: %EVAL result = (typeof dns_objective_resolver !== 'undefined') ? dns_objective_resolver : 'n/a';%
translations.test.desc.sip: Analysis of internet telephony key permformance indicators (dropped call ratio, call setup success ratio).
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.143: E-mail retrieval and storage (IMAP, TCP port 143 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.21: File Transfer Protocol (FTP, TCP port 21 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.22: Secure Login and File Transfers (SSH, TCP port 22 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.5060: Control of Communication Sessions (SIP, TCP port 5060 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.53: Domain Name Resolving (DNS, TCP port 53 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.554: Control of Audio and Visual Media Streaming (RTSP, TCP port 554 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.585: Secure E-mail Retrieval and Storage (IMAPS, TCP port 585 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.6881: Peer-to-Peer File Sharing (BitTorrent, TCP port 6881 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.993: Secure E-mail Retrieval and Storage (IMAPS, TCP port 993 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.tcp.out.995: Secure E-mail Retrieval (POP3S, TCP port 995 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.in: UDP Incoming, Port: %PARAM udp_objective_in_port 1 1 f%, Number of Packets: %PARAM udp_objective_in_num_packets 1 1 f%, Delay: %EVAL result = (typeof udp_objective_delay !== 'undefined') ? (udp_objective_delay / 1e6).toFixed(2) + ' ms' : '---';%
translations.test.desc.udp.out: UDP Outgoing, Port: %PARAM udp_objective_out_port 1 1 f%, Number of Packets: %PARAM udp_objective_out_num_packets 1 1 f% %EVAL result = (typeof udp_objective_delay !== 'undefined') ? ', Delay: ' + (udp_objective_delay / 1e6).toFixed(2) + ' ms' : '';%
translations.test.desc.udp.out.500: Establishment and Usage of Secure Services (ISAKMP, UDP port 500 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.out.5004: Streaming of Audio and Visual Media (RTP, UDP port 5004 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.out.5005: Quality of Service for Audio and Visual Media Streaming (RTCP, UDP port 5005 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.out.53: Domain Name Resolving (DNS, UDP port 53 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.out.554: Control of Audio and Visual Media Streaming (RTSP, UDP port 554 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.out.7078: Voice over IP (VoIP, UDP port 7078 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.udp.out.7082: Voice over IP (VoIP, UDP port 7082 outgoing)
translations.test.desc.voip: Simulated VoIP call. Duration: %PARAM voip_objective_call_duration 1000000 1 f% ms
translations.test.desc.web_connectivity: %EVAL result = (typeof mkit_result !== 'undefined') ? 'Test internet connectivity with target: ' + mkit_result.input : 'Test internet connectivity';%
translations.test.dns: DNS is a fundamental internet service to translate domain names to IP addresses. Each DNS test checks if this service is available, if answers are correct and measures server response time.
translations.test.echo: The client connects to a server that supports the Echo Protocol. Then the server sends back an identical copy of the data it received.
translations.test.http: This test downloads a test web resource (e.g. image) and checks, if it was modified during transport.
translations.test.mkit_dash: The Dash test analyzes the video streaming performance of the network connection.
translations.test.ndt: The NDT test provides plenty of tests to analyze network configuration and performance, with the aim of identifying potential issues in the network.
translations.test.ntp: This test checks if a request is modified by a proxy or other middlebox.
translations.test.sip: This test uses the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) to establish (set up) and simulate short calls to determine internet telephony key performance indicators.
translations.test.tcp: TCP is the most common connection-oriented internet protocol. Typical services http for websites or smtp for e-mail.
translations.test.trace: Traceroute shows the route across IP based networks.
translations.test.udp: UDP is an important connectionless internet protocol. Typical services real-time communication like VoIP or video streaming.
translations.test.voip: Voice over IP (VoIP) is a technology for the delivery of voice communication over IP based networks.
translations.test.website: The website rendering test downloads a reference web page (mobile Kepler page by ETSI), checks completeness, correct rendering and measures duration.
translations.timeout: Test was not completed. Timeout exceeded!
translations.trace.testinfo:
Traceroute Test Parameters:
Host: %PARAM traceroute_objective_host%
Is reverse traceroute? %EVAL result=(typeof traceroute_objective_is_reverse != "undefined" && traceroute_objective_is_reverse?"Yes":"No") %
Max. Hops: %PARAM traceroute_objective_max_hops%

Traceroute Test Results:
Hops Needed: %PARAM traceroute_result_hops%
Traceroute Result: %PARAM traceroute_result_status%

Full Route:
%EVAL result=String(nn.parseTraceroute(traceroute_result_details))%
translations.traceroute.failure: An error occured during traceroute test.
translations.udp.failure: UDP-Test failed. Some packets were lost.
translations.udp.out.testinfo:
UDP Outgoing:
Sending and receiving packets to QoS measurement peer on port %PARAM udp_objective_out_port 1 1% attempted.
Number of Packets Sent: %PARAM udp_objective_out_num_packets 1 1%
Packets Received by Server: %PARAM udp_result_out_num_packets 1 1%
Packets Received in reverse by Client: %PARAM udp_result_out_response_num_packets 1 1%.
Packet Loss Ratio: %PARAM udp_result_out_packet_loss_rate 1 2 f%{PERCENT}
Average delay: %EVAL if (typeof udp_result_out_rtt_avg_ns === 'undefined') result = '---'; else result = (udp_result_out_rtt_avg_ns / 1e6).toFixed(2) + ' ms';%
Delay variation: %EVAL if (typeof udp_result_out_rtts_ns === 'undefined' || (typeof udp_result_status !== 'undefined' && (udp_result_status === 'TIMEOUT' || udp_result_status === 'ERROR'))) { if (typeof udp_result_out_delay_standard_deviation_ns !== 'undefined') {result = (udp_result_out_delay_standard_deviation_ns/1e6).toFixed(2) + ' ms';} else { result = '---'; }} else { total = 0; c = 0; for (var rtt in udp_result_out_rtts_ns) { c++; total += Math.abs(udp_result_out_rtts_ns[rtt] - udp_result_out_rtt_avg_ns) } variation = total/c/1e6; result = variation.toFixed(2) + ' ms'; }%
translations.udp.success: UDP test succeeded. All packets were transferred.
translations.voip.incoming.packet.failure:
Incoming communication is missing. 
No incoming voice packet arrived at target.
translations.voip.jitter.incoming.failure: Incoming mean jitter is too high/empty: incoming voice packets are missing.
translations.voip.jitter.incoming.success: Incoming mean jitter is acceptable for VoIP communication
translations.voip.jitter.outgoing.failure: Outgoing mean jitter is too high/empty: outgoing voice packets are missing.
translations.voip.jitter.outgoing.success: Outgoing mean jitter is acceptable for VoIP communication.
translations.voip.outgoing.packet.failure: Outgoing communication is missing. No outgoing voice packet arrived at target.
translations.voip.testinfo:
%$IF (voip_result_status!='ERROR' && voip_result_status!='TIMEOUT')% Test Parameters
Sample Rate: %PARAM voip_objective_sample_rate 1 1%, Bits per Sample: %PARAM voip_objective_bits_per_sample 1 1%
Call Duration: %PARAM voip_objective_call_duration 1000000 1 f% ms
Packet Delay: %PARAM voip_objective_delay 1000000 1 f% ms
Payload Type: %EVAL result=String(nn.getPayloadType(voip_objective_payload))%
Target Port: %PARAM voip_objective_out_port 1 1%

Test Results

Incoming Voice Stream:
Max. Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_in_max_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Mean Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_in_mean_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Max. Delta: %PARAM voip_result_in_max_delta 1000000 2 f% ms
Skew: %PARAM voip_result_in_skew 1000000 2 f% ms
Packets Received: %PARAM voip_result_in_num_packets 1 1%
Sequence Errors: %PARAM voip_result_in_sequence_error 1 1%
Shortest/Longest Sequence: %PARAM voip_result_in_short_seq 1 1% / %PARAM voip_result_in_long_seq 1 1%

Outgoing Voice Stream:
Max. Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_out_max_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Mean Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_out_mean_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Max. Delta: %PARAM voip_result_out_max_delta 1000000 2 f% ms
Skew: %PARAM voip_result_out_skew 1000000 2 f% ms
Packets Received: %PARAM voip_result_out_num_packets 1 1%
Sequence Errors: %PARAM voip_result_out_sequence_error 1 1%
Shortest/Longest Sequence: %PARAM voip_result_out_short_seq 1 1% / %PARAM voip_result_out_long_seq 1 1% %$ENDIF (voip_result_status!='ERROR' && voip_result_status!='TIMEOUT')% %$IF (voip_result_status=='ERROR' || voip_result_status=='TIMEOUT')%No results available due to errors.%$ENDIF (voip_result_status=='ERROR' || voip_result_status=='TIMEOUT')%
translations.voip.testinfo.long:
%$IF (voip_result_status!='ERROR' && voip_result_status!='TIMEOUT')% Test Parameters
Sample Rate: %PARAM voip_objective_sample_rate 1 1%, Bits per Sample: %PARAM voip_objective_bits_per_sample 1 1%
Call Duration: %PARAM voip_objective_call_duration 1000000 1 f% ms
Packet Delay: %PARAM voip_objective_delay 1000000 1 f% ms
Payload Type: %EVAL result=String(nn.getPayloadType(voip_objective_payload))%
Target Port: %PARAM voip_objective_out_port 1 1%

Test Results

Incoming Voice Stream:
Max. Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_in_max_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Mean Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_in_mean_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Max. Delta: %PARAM voip_result_in_max_delta 1000000 2 f% ms
Skew: %PARAM voip_result_in_skew 1000000 2 f% ms
Packets Received: %PARAM voip_result_in_num_packets 1 1%
Sequence Errors: %PARAM voip_result_in_sequence_error 1 1%
Shortest/Longest Sequence: %PARAM voip_result_in_short_seq 1 1% / %PARAM voip_result_in_long_seq 1 1%

Outgoing Voice Stream:
Max. Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_out_max_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Mean Jitter: %PARAM voip_result_out_mean_jitter 1000000 2 f% ms
Max. Delta: %PARAM voip_result_out_max_delta 1000000 2 f% ms
Skew: %PARAM voip_result_out_skew 1000000 2 f% ms
Packets Received: %PARAM voip_result_out_num_packets 1 1%
Sequence Errors: %PARAM voip_result_out_sequence_error 1 1%
Shortest/Longest Sequence: %PARAM voip_result_out_short_seq 1 1% / %PARAM voip_result_out_long_seq 1 1% %$ENDIF (voip_result_status!='ERROR' && voip_result_status!='TIMEOUT')% %$IF (voip_result_status=='ERROR' || voip_result_status=='TIMEOUT')%No results available due to errors.%$ENDIF (voip_result_status=='ERROR' || voip_result_status=='TIMEOUT')%
translations.web_connectivity.testinfo: %EVAL result = (typeof mkit_result !== 'undefined') ? 'Test internet connectivity with target: ' + mkit_result.input : 'No result available';%
translations.website.long:
Transfer of %PARAM website_objective_url% took more than %PARAM website_objective_timeout 1000000000 0 f% s.
Duration: %PARAM website_result_duration_ns 1000000000 1 f% s
translations.website.short:
Transfer of %PARAM website_objective_url% took less than %PARAM website_objective_timeout 1000000000 0 f% s.
Duration: %PARAM website_result_duration_ns 1000000000 1 f% s
translations.website.testinfo:
The transfer of %PARAM website_objective_url% took %PARAM duration_ns 1000000000 1 f% s.

Transferred Data DL: %EVAL result = (typeof website_result_rx_bytes !== 'undefined') ? String(website_result_rx_bytes / 1000) + ' kB' : 'n/a';%
Transferred Data UL: %EVAL result = (typeof website_result_tx_bytes !== 'undefined') ? String(website_result_tx_bytes / 1000) + ' kB' : 'n/a';%
HTTP Status Code: %PARAM website_result_status%
